🔎 Speed up your OSINT investigations on IOCs using Coeus via the context menu.

Features:
   💎 Supported indicators: IPv4 , Domain , URL , Hash (MD5 , SHA1 , SHA256)

Context Menu Usage:
   1️⃣ Highlight text on a webpage 
   2️⃣ Right-Click to enter context menu
   3️⃣ Select Indicator type

Fun Fact
    🤡  In Greek mythology, Coeus (/ˈsiːəs/;[1] Ancient Greek: Κοῖος, Koios, "query, questioning" or "intelligence"[2]) also called Polus[3] was one of the Titans, one of the three groups of children born to Uranus (Sky) and Gaia (Earth).  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coeus
